repo.description: The most widely used Python to C compiler
repo.name: cython

body:
- avoid running them needlessly
- allow starting them selectively
- allow cancelling them without impacting the CI workflow

comment_data.diff_hunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,103 @@
+name: Benchmarks
+
+on:
+  workflow_dispatch:
+  push:
+    paths:
+      # Only run on changes likely to affect benchmark code generation
+      - ".github/workflows/benchmarks.yml"
+      - "Demos/benchmarks/**"
+      - "Cython/Utility/**"
+      - "Cython/Compiler/Nodes.py"
+      - "Cython/Compiler/ExprNodes.py"

commit.message: CI: Move benchmarks out of CI workflow file to avoid running it needlessly.

CI: Move the coverage jobs into a separate workflow file.
Avoid running them on anything but code changes.
CI: Move pydebug job into sanitizers.yml.
Change benchmark trigger for push events to apply to specific file paths rather than just the 'master' branch.
Add Optimize.py to the list of file triggers.

title: CI: Move independent workflows out of CI workflow file
